alert.note: Alert for Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tioga, northwestern Susquehanna and northeastern Bradford Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Windham, or 11 miles east of Athens, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orwell, Windham, Rome, Little Meadows, Friendsville, Warren Center, Tioga Terrace and West Warren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
